extensionDescription.message: Navigate, operate, and browse faster with mouse gestures! A customizable mouse gesture add-on with a variety of different commands.
extensionDescription.description: Navigate, operate, and browse faster with mouse gestures! A customizable mouse gesture add-on with a variety of different commands.

addonUpdateNotificationMessage.message: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.
addonUpdateNotificationMessage.description: The new version number is $VERSION$. Click here to view the changelog.

settingDescriptionMouseButton.message: Captures a new mouse gesture while the button is held down.
settingDescriptionMouseButton.description: Captures a new mouse gesture while the button is held down.

settingDescriptionMatchingAlgorithm.message: Determines how the gestures are compared to find the best matching gesture.
settingDescriptionMatchingAlgorithm.description: Determines how the gestures are compared to find the best matching gesture.

settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.message: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.
settingDescriptionTimeoutActive.description: Cancels the gesture after the mouse has not been moved for the specified time.

settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.message: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.
settingDescriptionTimeoutDuration.description: The duration in seconds until the gesture is cancelled.

settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.message: Cancels the active gesture or prevents a new gesture from being triggered while the key is pressed.
settingDescriptionSuppressionKey.description: Cancels the active gesture or prevents a new gesture from being triggered while the key is pressed.

settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.message: The minimum distance the mouse must be moved until the start of a gesture is recognized.
settingDescriptionDistanceThreshold.description: The minimum distance the mouse must be moved until the start of a gesture is recognized.

settingDescriptionDeviationTolerance.message: The permissible gesture deviation that should still be recognized as a match.
settingDescriptionDeviationTolerance.description: The permissible gesture deviation that should still be recognized as a match.

settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.message: Displays a trace along the mouse movement.
settingDescriptionDisplayTrace.description: Displays a trace along the mouse movement.

settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.message: Determines if the line thickness should grow.
settingDescriptionTraceGrowth.description: Determines if the line thickness should grow.

settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.message: Displays the command of the currently matching gesture if available.
settingDescriptionDisplayCommand.description: Displays the command of the currently matching gesture if available.

settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.message: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.
settingDescriptionCommandFontSize.description: Accepts every CSS Unit like: em, px, pt, %, vh etc.

settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.message: Shows a notification when Gesturefy is updated.
settingDescriptionUpdateNotification.description: Shows a notification when Gesturefy is updated.

extraDescriptionRockerActive.message: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.
extraDescriptionRockerActive.description: This gesture is performed either by holding the right mouse button and clicking the left or vice versa.

extraDescriptionWheelActive.message: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture trigger button.
extraDescriptionWheelActive.description: Scroll up or down while holding the wheel gesture trigger button.

extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.message: The mouse button which triggers the wheel gesture.
extraDescriptionWheelMouseButton.description: The mouse button which triggers the wheel gesture.

extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.message: The minimal amount the mouse wheel must be scrolled until the gesture is triggered.
extraDescriptionWheelSensitivity.description: The minimal amount the mouse wheel must be scrolled until the gesture is triggered.

blacklistTextInformation.message: Add URL match patterns to disable Gesturefy for certain websites. The match pattern allows "*" wildcards and must be in the form of <scheme>://<host><path>.
blacklistTextInformation.description: Add URL match patterns to disable Gesturefy for certain websites. The match pattern allows "*" wildcards and must be in the form of <scheme>://<host><path>.

aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.message: The selected file is not a valid Gesturefy config file.
aboutRestoreNotificationNoConfigFile.description: The selected file is not a valid Gesturefy config file.

aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.message: The selected file does not match the required file type.
aboutRestoreNotificationWrongFile.description: The selected file does not match the required file type.

aboutRestoreNotificationConfirm.message: All settings including gestures will be replaced by the selected config file.
aboutRestoreNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures will be replaced by the selected config file.

aboutRestoreNotificationSuccess.message: The selected config has been successfully restored.
aboutRestoreNotificationSuccess.description: The selected config has been successfully restored.

aboutResetNotificationConfirm.message: All settings including gestures will be reset. This cannot be undone!
aboutResetNotificationConfirm.description: All settings including gestures will be reset. This cannot be undone!

commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.message: Move left tabs to new window
commandLabelMoveLeftTabsToNewWindow.description: Move left tabs to new window

commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.message: Move right tabs to new window
commandLabelMoveRightTabsToNewWindow.description: Move right tabs to new window

commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.message: Open link in new private window
commandLabelOpenLinkInNewPrivateWindow.description: Open link in new private window

commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: Open custom URL in new tab
commandLabelOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Open custom URL in new tab

commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.message: Open URL from clipboard in new tab
commandLabelOpenURLFromClipboardInNewTab.description: Open URL from clipboard in new tab

commandDescriptionReloadFrame.message: Reloads the frame where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionReloadFrame.description: Reloads the frame where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionStopLoading.message: Stops the current page from loading.
commandDescriptionStopLoading.description: Stops the current page from loading.

commandDescriptionZoomOut.message: Zooms out of the current tab.
commandDescriptionZoomOut.description: Zooms out of the current tab.

commandDescriptionPageBack.message: Returns to the previous page of the history.
commandDescriptionPageBack.description: Returns to the previous page of the history.

commandDescriptionPageForth.message: Goes a page forward in the history.
commandDescriptionPageForth.description: Goes a page forward in the history.

commandDescriptionTogglePin.message: Pins or unpins the current Tab.
commandDescriptionTogglePin.description: Pins or unpins the current Tab.

commandDescriptionToggleMute.message: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.
commandDescriptionToggleMute.description: Mutes or unmutes the current tab.

commandDescriptionToggleReaderMode.message: Activates or deactivates the reader view if available.
commandDescriptionToggleReaderMode.description: Activates or deactivates the reader view if available.

commandDescriptionScrollTop.message: Scrolls to the top of the page.
commandDescriptionScrollTop.description: Scrolls to the top of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollBottom.message: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.
commandDescriptionScrollBottom.description: Scrolls to the bottom of the page.

commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.message: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.
commandDescriptionScrollPageDown.description: Scrolls down by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.message: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.
commandDescriptionScrollPageUp.description: Scrolls up by the length of the current view.

commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.message: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.
commandDescriptionFocusRightTab.description: Switches to the right tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.message: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.
commandDescriptionFocusLeftTab.description: Switches to the left tab of the current tab.

commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.message: Switches to the far left tab.
commandDescriptionFocusFirstTab.description: Switches to the far left tab.

commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.message: Switches to the far right tab.
commandDescriptionFocusLastTab.description: Switches to the far right tab.

commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.message: Switches to the last active tab.
commandDescriptionFocusPreviousSelectedT.description: Switches to the last active tab.

commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.message: Switches between maximized and normal window size.
commandDescriptionToggleWindowSize.description: Switches between maximized and normal window size.

commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.message: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.
commandDescriptionToggleFullscreen.description: Activates or deactivates full screen mode.

commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.message: Opens a new empty private window.
commandDescriptionNewPrivateWindow.description: Opens a new empty private window.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.message: Moves the current tab to the start of the tab strip.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToStart.description: Moves the current tab to the start of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.message: Moves the current tab to the end of the tab strip.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToEnd.description: Moves the current tab to the end of the tab strip.

commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.message: Moves the current tab to a new window.
commandDescriptionMoveTabToNewWindow.description: Moves the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.message: Moves all tabs to the left of the current tab to a new window.
commandDescriptionMoveLeftTabsToNewWindo.description: Moves all tabs to the left of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.message: Moves all tabs to the right of the current tab to a new window.
commandDescriptionMoveRightTabsToNewWind.description: Moves all tabs to the right of the current tab to a new window.

commandDescriptionToRootURL.message: Goes to the main page of the website.
commandDescriptionToRootURL.description: Goes to the main page of the website.

commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.message: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.
commandDescriptionURLLevelUp.description: Goes up the URL hierarchy for one level.

commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.message: Increases a number in the URL.
commandDescriptionIncreaseURLNumber.description: Increases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.message: Decreases a number in the URL.
commandDescriptionDecreaseURLNumber.description: Decreases a number in the URL.

commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.message: Opens the image, where the gesture started, in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenImageInNewTab.description: Opens the image, where the gesture started, in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.message: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewTab.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.message: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new window.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewWindow.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new window.

commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.message: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new private window.
commandDescriptionOpenLinkInNewPrivateWi.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, in a new private window.

commandDescriptionSearchTextSelection.message: Starts a web search of the selected text.
commandDescriptionSearchTextSelection.description: Starts a web search of the selected text.

commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.message: Starts a web search of the clipboard text.
commandDescriptionSearchClipboard.description: Starts a web search of the clipboard text.

commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.message: Closes all tabs to the right side.
commandDescriptionCloseRightTabs.description: Closes all tabs to the right side.

commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.message: Closes all tabs to the left side, excluding pinned tabs.
commandDescriptionCloseLeftTabs.description: Closes all tabs to the left side, excluding pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.message: Closes all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.
commandDescriptionCloseOtherTabs.description: Closes all tabs except of the current tab and pinned tabs.

commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.message: Saves the current page as a pdf file.
commandDescriptionSaveTabAsPDF.description: Saves the current page as a pdf file.

commandDescriptionSaveImage.message: Downloads the image, where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionSaveImage.description: Downloads the image, where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionSaveLink.message: Downloads either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionSaveLink.description: Downloads either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionPrintTab.message: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.
commandDescriptionPrintTab.description: Prints the current page by prompting the print dialog.

commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.message: Opens the print preview of the current page.
commandDescriptionOpenPrintPreview.description: Opens the print preview of the current page.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.message: Opens the specified URL in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURLInNewTab.description: Opens the specified URL in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.message: Opens the specified URL in the current tab.
commandDescriptionOpenCustomURL.description: Opens the specified URL in the current tab.

commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.message: Inserts the current clipboard text at the caret position of the input element where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionPasteClipboard.description: Inserts the current clipboard text at the caret position of the input element where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.message: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in the current tab.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboard.description: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in the current tab.

commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.message: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in a new tab.
commandDescriptionOpenURLFromClipboardIn.description: If the clipboard contains an URL, it will be opened in a new tab.

commandDescriptionOpenLink.message: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionOpenLink.description: Opens either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionViewImage.message: Opens the image where the gesture started.
commandDescriptionViewImage.description: Opens the image where the gesture started.

commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.message: Saves either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, as a bookmark.
commandDescriptionLinkToNewBookmark.description: Saves either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started, as a bookmark.

commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.message: Saves the current visible website area as an image.
commandDescriptionSaveScreenshot.description: Saves the current visible website area as an image.

commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.message: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTabURL.description: Copies the URL of the current tab to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.message: Copies either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyLinkURL.description: Copies either a selected url, or the link where the gesture started to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.message: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyTextSelection.description: Copies the current text selection to clipboard.

commandDescriptionCopyImage.message: Copies the image, where the gesture started, to clipboard.
commandDescriptionCopyImage.description: Copies the image, where the gesture started, to clipboard.

commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.message: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.
commandDescriptionViewPageSourceCode.description: Opens a new tab containing the source code of the page.

commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.message: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupAllTabs.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all currently open tabs and offers the possibility to switch to one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.message: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupRecentlyClosedTab.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all recently closed tabs and offers the possibility to restore one of them.

commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.message: Opens a popup containing a list of all installed search engines and offers the possibility to search the selected text with one of them.
commandDescriptionPopupSearchEngines.description: Opens a popup containing a list of all installed search engines and offers the possibility to search the selected text with one of them.

commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.message: Sends a custom message to another add-on. This allows the use of other add-ons functionality.
commandDescriptionSendMessageToOtherAddo.description: Sends a custom message to another add-on. This allows the use of other add-ons functionality.

commandDescriptionExecuteUserScript.message: Executes custom JavaScript code in the current webpage.
commandDescriptionExecuteUserScript.description: Executes custom JavaScript code in the current webpage.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.message: Determines the position of the new tab relative to the current tab.
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabPosition.description: Determines the position of the new tab relative to the current tab.

commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.message: Determines if the opened tab should gain focus or not.
commandSettingDescriptionNewTabFocus.description: Determines if the opened tab should gain focus or not.

commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.message: Determines which tab should be focused next.
commandSettingDescriptionTabNextFocus.description: Determines which tab should be focused next.

commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.message: Determines if pinned tabs can be closed or not.
commandSettingDescriptionTabClosePinned.description: Determines if pinned tabs can be closed or not.

commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.message: Determines if only tabs which belong to the current window should be restored.
commandSettingDescriptionRestoreCurrentW.description: Determines if only tabs which belong to the current window should be restored.

commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.message: Determines if the cache should be reloaded or not.
commandSettingDescriptionReloadCache.description: Determines if the cache should be reloaded or not.

commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.message: The zoom step or multiple comma separated levels in percentage. If omitted, Gesturefy's default zoom levels are used.
commandSettingDescriptionZoomStep.description: The zoom step or multiple comma separated levels in percentage. If omitted, Gesturefy's default zoom levels are used.

commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.message: The duration in milliseconds the scroll animation should take.
commandSettingDescriptionScrollDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds the scroll animation should take.

commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.message: Determines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.
commandSettingDescriptionFocusIncludePin.description: Determines if pinned tabs should be treated as the leftmost tabs.

commandSettingDescriptionTabCycling.message: Determines if the tabs should be cycled through in a loop.
commandSettingDescriptionTabCycling.description: Determines if the tabs should be cycled through in a loop.

commandSettingDescriptionExcludeDiscarde.message: Determines if tabs that are not loaded should be skipped.
commandSettingDescriptionExcludeDiscarde.description: Determines if tabs that are not loaded should be skipped.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.message: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL or link was selected.
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyTab.description: Determines if an empty tab should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.message: Determines if an empty window should be opened if no URL or link was selected.
commandSettingDescriptionOpenEmptyWindow.description: Determines if an empty window should be opened if no URL or link was selected.

commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.message: A custom search URL to which the search text is appended. If omitted, the default browser search engine will be used.
commandSettingDescriptionSearchEngineURL.description: A custom search URL to which the search text is appended. If omitted, the default browser search engine will be used.

commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.message: Determines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the file should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.
commandSettingDescriptionSavePromptDialo.description: Determines if the "Save As" dialog should appear or the file should be downloaded silently to the users default download folder.

commandSettingDescriptionCustomURL.message: The URL that should be opened.
commandSettingDescriptionCustomURL.description: The URL that should be opened.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.message: The extension ID of the add-on the message should be sent to.
commandSettingDescriptionAddonId.description: The extension ID of the add-on the message should be sent to.

commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.message: The message string that should be sent to the add-on.
commandSettingDescriptionAddonMessage.description: The message string that should be sent to the add-on.

commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.message: Determines if the message should be serialized as a JavaScript object.
commandSettingDescriptionParseMessage.description: Determines if the message should be serialized as a JavaScript object.

commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.message: Orders the displayed tabs by a specific characteristic.
commandSettingDescriptionTabOrder.description: Orders the displayed tabs by a specific characteristic.

commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.message: Determines if the currently active tab should be included.
commandSettingDescriptionTabIncludeCurre.description: Determines if the currently active tab should be included.

commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.message: Determines if the opened window should gain focus or not.
commandSettingDescriptionNewWindowFocus.description: Determines if the opened window should gain focus or not.

commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptWarni.message: User scripts can lead to the loss of private data.
commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptWarni.description: User scripts can lead to the loss of private data.

commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptCode.message: The code that should be injected into the webpage's scope.
commandSettingDescriptionUserScriptCode.description: The code that should be injected into the webpage's scope.

commandSettingDescriptionTargetFrame.message: The frame in which the user script should be injected.
commandSettingDescriptionTargetFrame.description: The frame in which the user script should be injected.

commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.message: The target URL cannot be opened. Click here for more information.
commandErrorNotificationMessageIllegalUR.description: The target URL cannot be opened. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.message: The specified message string could not be parsed to a JavaScript object. Click here for more information.
commandErrorNotificationMessageNotSerial.description: The specified message string could not be parsed to a JavaScript object. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.message: The specified extension ID either does not belong to an existing add-on or the add-on does not receive messages. Click here for more information.
commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingRe.description: The specified extension ID either does not belong to an existing add-on or the add-on does not receive messages. Click here for more information.

commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingIn.message: Gesturefy does not have permission for incognito mode. Click here for more information.
commandErrorNotificationMessageMissingIn.description: Gesturefy does not have permission for incognito mode. Click here for more information.

gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.message: Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture.
gesturePopupRecordingAreaText.description: Use the right mouse button to record a new gesture.

gesturePopupMouseButtonLeft.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonRight.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupMouseButtonMiddle.description: This will replace the placeholder in "Use the $MOUSEBUTTON$ mouse button to record a new gesture."

gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.message: Choose a command that should be assigned to this gesture.
gesturePopupDescriptionCommand.description: Choose a command that should be assigned to this gesture.

gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.message: Either use the arrow keys to enter the directions, or record them in the area next to it.
gesturePopupDescriptionGestureDirections.description: Either use the arrow keys to enter the directions, or record them in the area next to it.

gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.message: Assign a custom name that will be displayed instead of the command name.
gesturePopupDescriptionOptionalLabel.description: Assign a custom name that will be displayed instead of the command name.

gesturePopupNotificationSimilarGesture.message: This gesture is similar to the "$GESTURE_NAME$" gesture.
gesturePopupNotificationSimilarGesture.description: This gesture is similar to the "$GESTURE_NAME$" gesture.

welcomePageUpperSectionHeadline.message:
Never done a mouse gesture before?
 Try it out right now!
welcomePageUpperSectionHeadline.description:
Never done a mouse gesture before?
 Try it out right now!

welcomePageUpperSectionTutorialStep01.message: Press and hold the right mouse button
welcomePageUpperSectionTutorialStep01.description: Press and hold the right mouse button

welcomePageLowerSectionReference.message: You scrolled to the bottom of the page.
welcomePageLowerSectionReference.description: You scrolled to the bottom of the page.

welcomePageLowerSectionHeadline.message: Congratulations, you successfully accomplished your very first mouse gesture!
welcomePageLowerSectionHeadline.description: Congratulations, you successfully accomplished your very first mouse gesture!

welcomePageLowerSectionGetStartedText.message: Create as many gestures as you want to suit your individual browsing style and make your daily browsing easier, faster and a lot more fun. Get started now and personalize Gesturefy!
welcomePageLowerSectionGetStartedText.description: Create as many gestures as you want to suit your individual browsing style and make your daily browsing easier, faster and a lot more fun. Get started now and personalize Gesturefy!

welcomePageLowerSectionLearnMoreText.message: Still confused? Click the link below for a quick break-down and if you can't get Gesturefy up and running you can also find a troubleshooting guide there.
welcomePageLowerSectionLearnMoreText.description: Still confused? Click the link below for a quick break-down and if you can't get Gesturefy up and running you can also find a troubleshooting guide there.
